content: this legal text summarizes a court case in ljubljana slovenia the case involves the division of assets between exspouses and is governed by the marriage family relations act the court has determined that the joint property including an apartment garden and garage should be split equally between the plaintiff and defendants the total value of the assets involved is 110000 eur the court has also ordered the defendant to pay the plaintiff 35000 eur with interest and execute a deed in favor of the plaintiff within 15 days each party is responsible for their own costs the plaintiffs claim is upheld due to their financial and work contributions to the joint property as well as their care domestic work and property preservation the plaintiff is awarded half of the litigation costs the text also explains the process of appealing a judgment including the time limit requirements and consequences for noncompliance the text is dated august 21 2019 in ljubljana
